title: Prompt a message when creating a MNC for the current year, if the player doesn't have a valid one already
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a Major/Minor Outright
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking “Submit” or “Approve”
AND player does not have a valid MNC for the year
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "[Player Roster Last] requires a Minor League Contract for the current year."

title: User can submit an optional assignment to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am creating an optional assignment for a player
custom_steps: WHEN submitting the optional assignment
custom_expected:
THEN status updates to “Submitted to BOC”
AND system creates an entry in Players History: Code = OPTAS, Description = Optional Assignment

title: BOC user should see flags on Approvals Clipboard when certain rule checks fail
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a BOC user 
AND the ‘optioned’ assignment results in MJ active or under control limit being exceeded
custom_steps: WHEN the “Approving this transaction will exceed the Club’s Active or Under Control limit” message appears
custom_expected: THEN Flags will display on the Approvals clipboard

title: BOC user will receive an Approval item when an optional assignment tx is "Submitted to BOC"
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN an optional assignment tx reaches a status of “Submitted to BOC”
custom_expected:
THEN an approval item will be generated
AND approval item will be displayed on the Approvals widget

title: BOC user can approve an optional assignment tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN there is an Optional Assignment whose status is “Submitted to BOC”
custom_expected:
THEN clicking “Approve” will run all required field, formatting, On Submit and On Approve rules checks and display any relevant error or warning messages.
AND Update the player’s Player History: : Code = OPTAS, Description = Optional Assignment

title: BOC user can reject an optional assignment tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN there is an Optional Assignment whose status is “Submitted to BOC”
custom_expected:
THEN clicking “Reject” run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND Blue notification is displayed
AND transaction status is updated to “Rejected”

title: BOC user can reverse an optional assignment tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN there is an Optional Assignment whose status is “Approved”
custom_expected:
THEN clicking “Reverse” will run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND a blue notification will display
AND the transaction status is updated to “Reversed”

title: Club user will receive a notification when optional assignment tx is approved, rejected, or reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club user
AND have an optional assignment tx “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps:
WHEN the optional assignment tx has been Approved, Rejected, or Reversed
BUT not suppressed
custom_expected:
THEN Club user will receive a notification
AND “Description” will be a hyperlink
And “Player’s Name” will be a hyperlink

title: BOC user can suppress a reversed optional assignment tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN an optional assignment tx is in a state of “Approved” or “Reversed”
custom_expected:
THEN the BOC approver can “Reverse and Suppress” or “Suppress”
AND a blue notification will display
AND the tx will be hidden from the player’s Player History, Searches, and any other place where it would be visible on the UI

title: User can edit an existing optional assignment tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an existing Optional Assignment tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on “Edit”
custom_expected:
THEN the form will reload in edit mode
AND Club user will be able to attach new files only
AND BOC user will be able to edit all fields
BUT not if status “Approved” or “Reversed”

title: User can save an optional assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an Optional Assignment for a player
AND the transaction is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Save”
custom_expected:
THEN the system will save the tx and its current values
AND the status will be set to “Preliminary”
AND a blue notification will display

title: User can delete an optional assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an Optional Assignment for a player
AND the transaction is in a “Preliminary” or “Rejected” state
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking “Delete”
AND user clicks ‘Yes’, after the system generates generate a warning “Are you sure you want to delete this [form]?” “This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.”
custom_expected:
THEN the form will close
AND no record will be kept
AND user will return to the entry point of the tx
AND a blue notification will display

title: BOC - MJ tx - Optional Assignment Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN dealing with an Optional Assignment transaction
custom_expected:
THEN an ADMIN user can View, Print, View Flags, Attachments, Comments, Create, Delete, Edit, E-sign, Submit, Approve, Reject, Reverse, and Suppress
AND a BASIC user can View, Print, View Flags, and Attachments
BUT a BASIC user cannot make any changes or e-sign

title: Club - MJ tx - Optional Assignment Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a CLUB user
custom_steps: WHEN dealing with an Optional Assignment transaction
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and print
AND cannot see tx in a suppressed state
AND “BOC Notes” field
BUT ADMIN users can edit

title: Club user will receive an action item if an optional assignment tx has been submitted for a player that requires a MN contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have a MN league contract in a required state
custom_steps: WHEN a Club user submits an optional assignment transaction for that player
custom_expected:
THEN the Club user will receive an action item on submission
AND the “Description” will be a hyperlink
AND the “Players Name” will be a hyperlink

title: Club user will receive an action item if an optional assignment tx has been submitted for a player that requires an Addendum C
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have an Addendum C salary for the level of play they are being assigned to for the current year
custom_steps: WHEN a Club user is submitting an Optional Assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN the Club user will receive an action item on submission
AND the “Description” will be a hyperlink
AND the “Players Name” will be a hyperlink

title: User can view a player's addendum C information for an optional assignment tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is creating or viewing an optional assignment transaction
custom_steps: WHEN the player has one or more addendum C
custom_expected:
THEN the Addendum C's will be displayed
AND the Addendum C is un-editable

title: System should alert user that the player they are attempting to option does not have a valid salary for the selected level of play
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating an optional assignment tx
custom_steps:
WHEN selecting a value for the “Assign To” field
AND the player is missing a valid salary for the selected level of play
custom_expected:
THEN the system should highlight in red the level of play on any displayed Addendum C
AND the system should also display in red text "The Player needs a valid Addendum C at the level of play he's being optioned to."
BUT if the player is NOT missing a valid salary for the selected level of play, the system will not make any changes visually to the form.

title: System should generate an error if player being optioned does not have a pending roster status at the MJ level
custom_preconds: GIVEN user selects “Optional Assignment” from the Create New menu
custom_steps: WHEN the player’s pending roster status is not at the MJ league level
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "This transaction is for Major League players only."

title: System should generate an error when creating an optional assignment if assignment date is before the  pending or approved transaction date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has an existing approved or pending optional assignment tx
custom_steps:
WHEN creating a new optional assignment
AND the assignment date is before the existing optional assignment tx
AND clicking “Submit” or “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "A transaction cannot occur before the date of <Roster Name Last Name>'s latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: System should generate a warning when an optional assignment tx exceeds the MN Club's Active or Under Control limit
custom_preconds: GIVEN a MN League Club’s active or under control limit is maxed
custom_steps: WHEN clicking submit on an optional assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN a warning will appear "The club [Major League club name] will exceed the Active List or Under Control limit. Active Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#] Under Control Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]"
AND it will be a flag

title: System should generate an error when back or future dating an optional assignment date more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating a new optional assignment
custom_steps:
WHEN the assignment date is 10 days before or after the current date
AND click “Submit”
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "Assignment Date must be within 10 days of submission."

title: System should generate an error when submitting an optional assignment tx when assignment date is not on or between the Spring Training Start and Last Day of Season
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is creating an optional assignment tx with an assignment date NOT on or between spring training start and last day of season
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit” or “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "[Player Roster Last] cannot be optioned in the period between the close of the regularly scheduled season and spring training."

title: System should generate an error when submitting an optional assignment without the "Player's Written Consent" checkbox being checked.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is creating an optional assignment
AND the Player’s Written Consent checkbox is NOT checked
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error message will appear "[Player Roster Last] needs to give written consent for this assignment."

title: System should generate an error when submitting an optional assignment for a player that does not have options remaining
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is creating an optional assignment
AND the player does NOT have options remaining
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "[Player Roster Last] has no options remaining."

title: System should generate an error the optioning player does not have a valid MJ Roster Status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is creating an optional assignment
AND the player does NOT have a valid MJ Roster Status
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "[Player Roster Last] cannot be on the DL or IL for this assignment."

title: System should generate an error if optioning player is going to a Club that is not currently in season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating an optional assignment
AND the "to-club" plays at the SA, R, RA, DSL, VSL, ASL, or GCL level of play
AND the current date is not on or between the first and last days of the season for that club (set in club system dates)
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "The club [MN club name] must have First Game and Last Game dates entered in Club Season dates. Please contact BOC."

title: System should generate an error to create an addendum C if optioned player requires one
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have an addendum c for the level of play they are being optioned to
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN the error message will appear "Player does not yet have a salary in his Addendum C for his new level of play. Please ensure one is created before the start of the next season."
BUT if the transaction date is before March 15th, the system will check if the player has an Addendum C salary with a status of Tendered, Approved, Pending Approval, or Update for the current year 
THEN a warning message appears "Player does not yet have a salary in his Addendum C for his new level of play. Please ensure one is created before the start of the next season."

title: System should generate an error to create an MNC if optioned player does not have a valid one for the year
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating an optional assignment
AND the player does NOT have a valid MNC for the year
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "[Player Roster Last] requires a Minor League Contract for the current year."

title: System should generate an error if a BOC approver is approving an optional assignment tx with an assignment date after the current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC approver
AND there is an optional assignment tx with an assignment date after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."

title: User can view an existing Recall tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an exisiting Recall tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on the transaction in the player’s Player History
custom_expected: THEN the tx will open in the same window

title: User can create a Recall tx from a player's Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a player’s Player History
custom_steps: WHEN selecting “Create New”, "Transactions", "Major", "Assignments", "Recall"
custom_expected:
THEN a new Recall tx will open in the window
BUT if a submitted tx exists, the existing transaction will open in View Mode instead of opening a new transaction

title: User can save a Recall tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is in a Recall tx in Edit Mode
AND has made changes
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Save”
custom_expected:
THEN all values will be saved
AND the tx status will be set to “Preliminary”
AND a blue notification will display

title: User can submit a Recall tx to BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a Club user
AND has completed a Recall tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit to BOC”
custom_expected:
THEN the status of the form will change to “Submitted to BOC”
AND the system will reload the tx in view mode
AND a blue notification will appear

title: BOC approver will receive an approval item when a Recall is submitted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC approver
AND there is a Recall tx with a status of “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN on the Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN the Recall tx will appear as an Approval item
AND any flags, comments, and links will be displayed
AND the players name and description will be hyperlinks

title: Players pending Org, Club, and Roster statues should update when user submits a recall to BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a Recall tx
custom_steps: WHEN the tx status is updated to “Submitted to BOC”
custom_expected:
THEN the system sets players pending Club to the Major League Club.
AND the system sets the player’s pending minor league roster status to null.
AND if the "Not to Report" checkbox is checked the system sets the player's pending major league roster status to "Not to Report"
BUT if the "Not to Report" checkbox is unchecked, and it is currently in season and the Report Date is after the current date, the system sets the player's pending major league roster status to "Not Yet Reported"

title: BOC user can approve a Recall tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND there is a Recall tx with a status “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Approve”
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status is updated to “Approved”
AND a blue notification is displayed
AND the Player’s Player History updates: Code = RECOP, Description = ”Recall” or “Recall- Not to report” [show this for transactions with Not to Report checkbox activated], From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font.

title: BOC user can reject a Recall tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND there is a Recall tx with a status of “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Reject”
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to “Rejected”
AND Successful reject notification is displayed

title: BOC user can reverse a Recall tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC approver
AND there is a Recall tx with a status of “Approved”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Reverse”
custom_expected:
THEN a successful revers notification will be displayed
AND the tx status is updated to “Reversed”
AND player's major and minor roster statuses are reverted to what they were prior to the transaction approval
AND player's Club is set back to what it was prior to the transaction approval

title: Club user will receive a notification when Recall tx is approved, rejected, or reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club user
AND have a Recall tx “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps:
WHEN the Recall tx has been Approved, Rejected, or Reversed
BUT not suppressed
custom_expected:
THEN Club user will receive a notification
AND “Description” will be a hyperlink
And “Player’s Name” will be a hyperlink

title: BOC user can suppress a reversed Recall tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN a Recall tx is in a state of “Approved” or “Reversed”
custom_expected:
THEN the BOC approver can “Reverse and Suppress” or “Suppress”
AND a blue notification will display
AND the tx will be hidden from the player’s Player History, Searches, and any other place where it would be visible on the UI

title: User can delete a Recall tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a Recall tx for a player
AND the transaction is in a “Preliminary” or “Rejected” state
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking “Delete”
AND user clicks ‘Yes’, after the system generates generate a warning “Are you sure you want to delete this [form]?” “This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.”
custom_expected:
THEN the form will close
AND no record will be kept
AND user will return to the entry point of the tx
AND a blue notification will display

title: BOC - MJ tx - Recall Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN dealing with an Recall transaction
custom_expected:
THEN an ADMIN user can View, Print, View Flags, Attachments, Comments, Create, Delete, Edit, E-sign, Submit, Approve, Reject, Reverse, and Suppress
AND a BASIC user can View, Print, View Flags, and Attachments
BUT a BASIC user cannot make any changes or e-sign

title: Club - MJ tx - Recall Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a CLUB user
custom_steps: WHEN dealing with a Recall transaction
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and print
AND cannot see tx in a suppressed state
AND “BOC Notes” field
BUT ADMIN users can edit

title: User can edit Recall tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an existing Recall tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on “Edit”
custom_expected:
THEN the form will reload in edit mode
AND Club user will be able to attach new files only
AND BOC user will be able to edit all fields
BUT not if status “Approved” or “Reversed”

title: BOC user should see flags on Approvals Clipboard when certain rule checks fail
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a BOC user 
AND the ‘Recall’ assignment results in MJ active or under control limit being exceeded
custom_steps: WHEN the "Approving this transaction will exceed the Club's Active or Under Control limit" message appears
custom_expected: THEN Flags will display on the Approvals clipboard

title: User can see a "Player to Replace" dropdown on Recall
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is creating a recall for that player
custom_steps:
WHEN a player has a pending or approved Optional Assignment that has an Assignment Date in the last 10 days
AND Post game assignment checkbox is not checked
AND the Assignment date is NOT after the “Last Playoff Date”
AND a Recall was not automatically created
custom_expected: THEN the “Player to Replace” dropdown should be displayed.

title: System should generate an error when selecting Recall, if player does not have a valid MJ Roster Status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have a valid MJ Roster Status
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects “Recall” from the create new menu
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "[Player Roster Last] must be optioned from the majors and active in the minors."

title: Club user should be prevented from initiating a Recall and system should generate error, if players does not belong to users Org
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a Club user
AND selecting a player that does not belong to my Org
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting “Recall”
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."

title: System should generate an error if the Org of the player being Recalled does not have season dates entered
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player’s Org does not have a First Game of Season and a Last Game of Season date entered on the Club Season dates screen for the current year
custom_steps: WHEN selecting “Recall” from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "The club [MJ or MN club name] must have First Game and Last Game dates entered in Club Season dates. Please contact BOC."

title: System should generate an error if the player being Recalled is not on a roster
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player is not on a roster
custom_steps: WHEN attempting a “Recall” tx
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "This transaction can only be performed on a player who is currently affiliated with an organization."

title: System should generate an error if back or future date of Recall assignment is more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player is not on a roster
custom_steps: WHEN attempting a “Recall” tx
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "This transaction can only be performed on a player who is currently affiliated with an organization."

title: System should generate an error if player being recalled has a pending or approved tx after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is creating a “Recall” tx
AND the player has a pending or approved tx after the entered assignment date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit” or “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN an error message will appear "A transaction cannot occur before the date of <Roster Name Last Name>'s latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: System should generate a warning if MJ league Club's active or under control limit are exceeded by a recall tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a recall tx will exceed the MJ league Club’s active or under control limit
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit” or “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN the warning message will appear "The club [Major League club name] will exceed the Active List or Under Control limit. Active Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#] Under Control Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]"

title: System will generate an error message for a BOC approver attempting to approve a Recall tx with an assignment date after the current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND a “Recall” tx has an assignment date after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."

title: User can view Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds: Given that user is viewing a player's history
custom_steps: WHEN that user clicks a transaction
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction opens in View mode
AND the user sees a Close button
AND the close button returns the user to the entry point of the transaction

title: User can create Transfer of Option from a player's Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a player’s Player History
custom_steps: WHEN selecting “Create New”, "Transactions", "Major", "Assignments", "Transfer of Option"
custom_expected:
THEN a new "Transfer of Option" tx will open in the window
BUT if a submitted tx exists, the existing transaction will open in View Mode instead of opening a new transaction

title: User can view a player's addendum C information for a Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is creating or viewing a Transfer of Option tx
custom_steps: WHEN the player has one or more addendum C
custom_expected:
THEN the Addendum C's will be displayed
AND the Addendum C is un-editable

title: System should alert user that the player they are attempting a Transfer of Option does not have a valid salary for the selected level of play
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating an Transfer of Option tx
custom_steps:
WHEN selecting a value for the “Assign To” field
AND the player is missing a valid salary for the selected level of play
custom_expected:
THEN the system should highlight in red the level of play on any displayed Addendum C
AND the system should also display in red text "The Player needs a valid Addendum C at the level of play he's being optioned to."
BUT if the player is NOT missing a valid salary for the selected level of play, the system will not make any changes visually to the form.

title: User can save a Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a Transfer of Option tx for a player
AND the transaction is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Save”
custom_expected:
THEN the system will save the tx and its current values
AND the status will be set to “Preliminary”
AND a blue notification will display

title: User can submit a Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a Club user
AND has completed a Transfer of Option tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit to BOC”
custom_expected:
THEN the status of the form will change to “Submitted to BOC”
AND the system will reload the tx in view mode
AND a blue notification will appear

title: BOC approver should receive an approval item when a Transfer of Option is "Submitted to BOC"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC approver
AND there is a Transfer of Option tx with a status of “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN on the Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN the Transfer of Option tx will appear as an Approval item
AND any flags, comments, and links will be displayed
AND the players name and description will be hyperlinks

title: BOC user can reject a Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND there is a Transfer of Option tx with a status of “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Reject”
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to “Rejected”
AND Successful reject notification is displayed

title: BOC user can approve a Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND there is a Transfer of Option tx with a status “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Approve”
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status is updated to “Approved”
AND a blue notification is displayed
AND the Player’s Player History updates: Code = OPTTR, Description = Transfer of Option, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font.
AND set the player’s current club to be the destination/target club

title: BOC user can reverse a Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC approver
AND there is a Transfer of Option tx with a status of “Approved”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Reverse”
custom_expected:
THEN a successful revers notification will be displayed
AND the tx status is updated to “Reversed”
AND player's major and minor roster statuses are reverted to what they were prior to the transaction approval
AND player's Club is set back to what it was prior to the transaction approval

title: BOC user can suppress a reversed Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN a Transfer of Option tx is in a state of “Approved” or “Reversed”
custom_expected:
THEN the BOC approver can “Reverse and Suppress” or “Suppress”
AND a blue notification will display
AND the tx will be hidden from the player’s Player History, Searches, and any other place where it would be visible on the UI

AND the transaction is in a “Preliminary” or “Rejected” state
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking “Delete”
AND user clicks ‘Yes’, after the system generates generate a warning “Are you sure you want to delete this [form]?” “This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.”
custom_expected:
THEN the form will close
AND no record will be kept
AND user will return to the entry point of the tx
AND a blue notification will display

AND a BASIC user can View, Print, View Flags, and Attachments
BUT a BASIC user cannot make any changes or e-sign

custom_steps: WHEN dealing with an  Transfer of Options transaction
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and print
AND cannot see tx in a suppressed state
AND “BOC Notes” field
BUT ADMIN users can edit

title: Club user should receive notification when Transfer of Option tx is approved, rejected, or reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club user
AND have an  Transfer of Option tx “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps:
WHEN the optional assignment tx has been Approved, Rejected, or Reversed
BUT not suppressed
custom_expected:
THEN Club user will receive a notification
AND “Description” will be a hyperlink
And “Player’s Name” will be a hyperlink

title: User can edit a Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an existing Transfer of Option tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on “Edit”
custom_expected:
THEN the form will reload in edit mode
AND Club user will be able to attach new files only
AND BOC user will be able to edit all fields
BUT not if status “Approved” or “Reversed”

title: Club user will receive an action item if a Transfer of Option tx has been submitted for a player that requires an Addendum C
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have an Addendum C salary for the level of play they are being assigned to for the current year
custom_steps: WHEN a Club user is submitting an Transfer of Option tx
custom_expected:
THEN the Club user will receive an action item on submission
AND the “Description” will be a hyperlink
AND the “Players Name” will be a hyperlink

title: BOC user should receive a notification when the Transfer of Option tx assignment date is in the last 20 days before the "Last day of Season" with "to club"at a lower level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC Approver
AND a Transfer of Option tx reaches a status of "Submitted to BOC"
custom_steps: WHEN the assignement date is in the last 20 days before the “Last day of season” with a “to club” at a lower level of play than the “from club"
custom_expected:
THEN a notification should appear on the Notifications clipboard
AND the Description should be a hyperlink
AND the player's name should be a hyperlink

title: BOC user should see flags on Approvals Clipboard when certain rule checks fail
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a BOC user 
AND the ‘Transfer of Option’ assignment results in MJ active or under control limit being exceeded
custom_steps: WHEN the "Approving this transaction will exceed the Club's Active or Under Control limit" message appears
custom_expected: THEN Flags will display on the Approvals clipboard

title: Club user should be prevented from initiating a Transfer of Option and system should generate error, if players does not belong to users Org
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Club user has a player that does not belong to that club
custom_steps: WHEN selecting “Transfer of Option” on the Create New menu from their Player History
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."

title: System should generate an error if player being transferred, has a pending Level is MN League
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player’s pending level of play is not at a minor league level
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Transfer of Option" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "Player must be playing at the minor league level in order to perform this transaction."

title: System should generate an error if player being transferred is not on a roster
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player is not on a roster
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Transfer of Option" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "This transaction can only be performed on a player who is currently affiliated with an organization."

title: System should generate an error if creating a player being transferred does not have a valid roster status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have a valid roster status
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Transfer of Option" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "[Player Roster Last] must be optioned from the majors and active in the minors"

title: System should generate an error if submitting a player being transferred does not have a valid roster status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have a valid roster status
custom_steps: WHEN selecting “Transfer of Option” from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN an error message will appear "[Player Roster Last] must be optioned from the majors and active in the minors"

title: System should generate an error if back or future dated Transfer of Option's assignment date is more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN the assignment date is 10 or more days prior or after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit”
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "Assignment Date must be within 10 days of submission."

title: System should generate an error when creating a Transfer of Option if assignment date is before the pending or approved transaction date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a pending or approved tx after the entered assignment date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "A transaction cannot occur before the date of <Roster Name Last Name>'s latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: System should generate a warning if the MN league Club's active or under control limit will be exceeded with a Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a MN League Club’s active or under control limit is maxed
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" on a “Transfer of Option” tx
custom_expected: THEN a warning will appear "The club [Minor League club name] will exceed the Active List or Under Control limit. Active Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#] Under Control Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]"

title: System should generate an error if the Transfer of Option tx is to a VSL or DSL club subject to rule 4 draft
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player is being transferred to a VSL or DSL club
AND the player’s status is NOT, “Not Subject”
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve”
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "Players previously subject to the Rule 4 Draft may not be transferred to DSL or VSL clubs"

title: System should generate an error when transferring a player to a lower level too close to the end of the season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player being transferred to a lower level of player
AND if the assignment date is in the last 20 days before the “Last day of season” with a “to club” at a lower level of play than the “from club”
AND does not equal either of those dates
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit”
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "<Last Name>, <Roster name> is being sent to a lower level of play during the last 20 days of the season and must be approved by Minor League Baseball"

title: System should generate an error to create an addendum C if transfered player requires one
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have an addendum c for the level of play they are being transferred to
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN an error message appears "Player is missing a salary in his Addendum C for his new level of play."
BUT if the transaction date is before March 15th, the system will check if the player has an Addendum C salary with a status of Tendered, Approved, Pending Approval, or Update for the current year 
THEN a warning message appears "Player does not yet have a salary in his Addendum C for his new level of play. Please ensure one is created before the start of the next season."

title: System should generate an error if approving a player being transferred does not have a valid roster status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have a valid roster status
custom_steps: WHEN selecting “Transfer of Option” from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN an error message will appear "[Player Roster Last] must be optioned from the majors and active in the minors"

title: System should generate an error if approving a Transfer of Option with an assignment date after the current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND a transfer of option tx has an assignment date after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN the error message will appear "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."

title: Save an appointment of 26th man for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a club user
AND have selected APPT26 transaction from create new menu for a major league player
custom_steps:
WHEN I fill in the transaction
AND click Save
custom_expected:
Transaction and all added values are successfully saved
Transaction status will be preliminary(in red)

title: Edit an appointment of 26th man for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a club user
AND have opened an existing preliminary APPT26th transaction
custom_steps: WHEN I click Edit button
custom_expected: (in progress)

title: Submit an appointment of 26th man for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a club user
AND have selected APPT26 transaction from create new menu for a major league player
custom_steps:
WHEN I fill in the transaction
AND click Submit
custom_expected:
Transaction and all added values are successfully saved
Transaction status will be submitted and current status displays in green text
Blue successful notification appears

title: BOC user sees flags for Optional Assignments on approvals clipboard
custom_expected: (In progress)

title: BOC user can approve an appointment of 26th man tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN I view the approvals clipboard
AND open an existing submitted APPT26 TX
AND click Approve button
custom_expected:
The tx status updates to approved
Transaction reloads in view mode
Blue success notification appears

title: BOC user can reject an appointment of 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND have opened an existing submitted APPT26 transaction from Approvals Clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN I click Reject button
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction reloads and status is rejected
AND Blue success notification appears
AND Transaction disappears from approvals Clipboard
AND Transaction appears in notifications for Submitting Club

title: BOC user can Reverse a 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC user
AND have opened an existing APPROVED APPT 26th tx [From search or player history]
custom_steps: WHEN I click on Reverse button
custom_expected:
THEN The transaction status is updated to reversed
AND the player history will have VOIDED in the description for tx
AND players roster status/club/org will update to prior status before approval of tx

title: BOC user can Reverse and Suppress a 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC user
AND have opened an existing approved APPT26 transaction
custom_steps: WHEN I Click Reverse and Suppress from the bottom of the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN a blue success notification appears
AND tx status updates to suppressed
AND transaction no longer shows in player history
AND will not show up in searches (unless BOC specifically searches for 'suppressed' tx)

title: BOC user sees flags for appointment of 26th man on approvals clipboard
Prevent appointment 26th man tx for player not belonging to users club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am loggged in as Club User A [ARI]
AND I am viewing the MJ Roster Widget for Club B [BOS]
custom_steps:
WHEN I select a player from Club Bs Roster
AND I select APPT26th tx from the menu
custom_expected:
THEN I should receieve a blocker message :
Body: "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."
Hint Text:"If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC."

AND the only option is BACK button

title: Error for player being appointed who is not on a roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND have performed a search for a player who is released, or free agent
custom_steps:
WHEN I select create new from his player history
AND select APPT26th man
custom_expected:
THEN I should receive this error message :
This transaction can only be performed on a player who is currently affiliated with an organization."

AND the only option is to go BACK

title: Error if First Game and Last Game of Season in Club system dates for target club
custom_preconds:
*note that dev will have to update First and Last day of season to null for a club in the system

GIVEN I am logged in as Club whose system dates are missing
AND I can view the MJ Roster
custom_steps:
When I choose an active player 
AND select APPT26 man from create new
custom_expected:
THEN I should receieve error message - The club [MJ club name] must have First Game and Last Game dates entered in Club Season dates. Please contact BOC."

AND the only option is BACK button

title: Error if player does not have a valid roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC or Club user
AND I am viewing the MJ Roster widget
custom_steps:
WHEN I select a player who does NOT have a roster status of Active
AND I select Appt26 tx for this player
custom_expected:
THEN I should receieve error message - "[Player Roster Last] must be optioned from the majors and active in the minors"

AND (for club) the only option is BACK  button
AND (for BOC) the otions are Ignore or BACK

title: Error if creating an optional assignment tx for a player that has a recent 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC or Club user
AND I have selected a player from MJ roster who has an approved/submitted APPT26 tx today (or last 2 days)
custom_steps: WHEN I select an Optional Assignment from the create new menu for selected player
custom_expected:
THEN I should get a warning message - "If you are returning a recently appointed 26th man, please enter a “Return of 26th man” transaction."

AND I can ignore and continue or go back

title: Error if Back or Future dated appointment of 26th man's assignment date is more than 3 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC or Club
AND I am viewing the MJ Roster widget
custom_steps:
WHEN I select a player
AND select a APPT26 tx for selected player
AND I backdate the tx (or future date) more than 3 days from current date
AND I click Submit(club) or Approve(Boc)
custom_expected:
THEN I should get a warning - "Assignment Date must be within 3 days of submission."
AND I can Ignore or go back (BOC Only)
AND I can only go back (Club)

title: Error if creating an appointment of 26th man has a pending or approved tx after the entered assignment date
submitting an appointment of 26th man to the BOC update a player's pending Org and Club roster status
Warning when submitting or approving an appointment of 26th man tx
View an existing Return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an existing Return of 26th Man tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on the tx in a player's Player History
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will open in the same window
AND the close button will be visible

title: Create a new Return from 26th man tx from player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user in on a player's Player History
AND clicks "Create New" button
custom_steps:
WHEN selecting "Major" radio button
AND selecting "Assignments"
AND selecting "Return of 26th Man"
custom_expected:
THEN the new tx will open
BUT if tx already exists the system will load the existing tx

title: Save a Return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a tx is in edit mode
custom_steps:
THEN changes have been made to the tx
AND the user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will save the current values
AND the status will be set to "Preliminary" if not already there
AND a blue notification will display

title: Submit a Return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Return of 26th man tx is in preliminary or rejected states
AND the form is in edit or view mode
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN the system will reload the tx in view mode
AND the status will update to "Submitted to BOC"
AND the entry on the player's Player History will display: Code = RET26, Description = Return of 26th Man and the From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields in Green font

title: BOC user approve a return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC approver
AND the Return of 26th man tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on approve
custom_expected:
THEN the status of the tx is updated to "Approved"
AND if it was in edit mode, it will reload in view mode
AND a blue notification is displayed
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = RET26, Description = Return of 26th Man, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND set the player’s current club and level of play to be the destination/target club and its level.
AND set the player's MJ Roster Status to Optioned.
AND set the player's MN Roster Status to Active.

title: BOC user reject a return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC approver
AND the Return of 26th man tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN the status of the tx is updated to "Rejected"
AND a blue notification is displayed
AND if the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, it is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND reverse player's Pending org and club
AND reverse pending MJ Roster Status and Pending MN Roster Status
AND remove pending player history entry.

title: Delete a Return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Return of 26th man is in a state of Preliminary or Rejected
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Delete"
custom_expected:
THEN they user will be prompted 
AND upon confirmation the form will close and no record will be kept of the tx
AND the tx will return to the entry point
AND a blue notification will display

title: BOC user Reverse a Return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Return of 26th man tx is in the state "Approved"
AND user is a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on "Reverse"
custom_expected:
THEN the status will update to "Reversed"
AND the tx will display in Player History "Voided"
AND Player's Club, MJ and MN Roster statuses and level of play will update to their values from prior to the tx being approved

title: BOC user Reverse and Suppress a Return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Return of 26th man tx is in the state "Approved"
AND user is a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on "Reverse and Suppress"
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will first reverse, and then suppress the tx
AND it will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches, and any other place where it is visible on UI

title: BOC user Suppress a Return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Return of 26th man tx is in the state "Reversed"
AND user is a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Suppress" will suppress the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN it will suppress the transaction
AND it will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches, and any other place where it is visible on UI.
BUT if its NOT the most recent transaction the message "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed." will display

title: Return of 26th Man Permissions - BOC - MJ tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN in a Return of 26th man tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and Print all major league transactions in all states for Major League Players
AND can view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND can create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND can Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags
BUT if BOC basic user can only print and view flags

title: Return of 26th Man Permissions - Club - MJ tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN in a Return of 26th man tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and print all major league tx in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that tx
AND can view all APPROVED major league tx including other club's Major League tx or BOC only tx
AND can create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League tx for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org"
BUT cannot view suppressed tx and see BOC notes field

title: Club user will receive a notification upon approver, reject, or reverse of a tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is Club user
AND is on the notifications clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN a Return of 26th man tx is moved to approve, reject, or reverse
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification that the tx was updated to "Approved", "Rejected", or "Reversed"
AND "Description" and "Players Name" will be a hyperlink 
BUT if tx is suppressed all notifications for the current tx will be removed from the notifications clipboard

title: BOC user see flags on Return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN any warning or errors occur that are marked a flags for a Return of 26th man tx
custom_expected:
THEN when on the Approvals clipboard for that approval item a flag will be visible
AND when clicking on the flags icon opens a popover with the flags that are currently set for the form
BUT flags are dismissed on Approve or Reject

title: Edit an existing Return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a Return of 26th man tx for a player
AND it is in a preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN the tx is in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a club user can attach new files
AND a boc user can edit all fields in all states
BUT if tx is approved or reversed boc can only attach new files and edit existing attachments
AND update comments and boc notes fields

title: Error if player does not have an approved appointment of 26th man tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN player does not have an approved Appointment of 26th Man tx
custom_steps: WHEN selecting Return of 26th man from the create new menu
custom_expected:
THEN an error will display "You can only use this transaction to return a recently appointed 26th Man."
BUT if an approved Appointment of 26th Man tx is found more than 2 days ago
THEN an error will display "Player's latest Appointment of 26th Man transaction was prior to two days in the past on {mm/dd/yyyy}. "

title: Club user can not initiate a return of 26th man tx for a player that does not belong to the club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a club user
AND selected a player that does not belong to their Org
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Return of 26th Man" from the create new menu from their Player History
custom_expected: THEN Error will display "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization.", "If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC."

title: Error if player attempting to return is not on a roster
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a roster status for MN or MJ of Free Agent, Released, or Released
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Return of 26th Man" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "This transaction can only be performed on a player who is currently affiliated with an organization."

title: Error if player attempting to return's club is at the MN level
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player's Pending Level of Play is not at the MJ level
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Return of 26th Man" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "This transaction is for Major League players only"

title: Error if player attempting to return's not Active
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have a pending MJ Roster Status of "Active"
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Return of 26th Man" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "[Player Roster Last] must be Active to be assigned."

title: Error if a return of 26th man for a pending or approved tx after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a "Return of 26th Man" has the assignment date before the latest approved or pending tx date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error message displays "A transaction cannot occur before the date of <Roster Name Last Name>'s latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: Error if returning a player outside of the season
custom_preconds: GIVEN a "Return of 26th Man" has an assignment date prior to the Spring Training date or After the Last Day of MJ Season date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "[Player Roster Last] cannot be Returned in the period between the close of the regularly scheduled season and spring training."

title: Error if back or future date of Return of 26th man's assignment date is more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN a "Return of 26th Man" tx is not back or future dated more than 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "Assignment Date must be within 10 days of submission."

title: Warning if MN league club's active or under control limit will be exceeded
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return of 26th Man" tx
AND the MN Club is over their under control or active roster limits
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "The club [Minor League club name] will exceed the Active List or Under Control limit. Active Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#] Under Control Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]"

title: Error if attempting to approve a Return of 26th man tx with an assignment date after the current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Return of 26th man tx is ready to be approved
AND user is a BOC approver
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking "Approve"
AND the assignment date is after the current date for the tx
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."

title: Designate for Release or Assignment Permissions - BOC - Major Transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN on a Designate for Release and Assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN BOC ADMIN can view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND can view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND can create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND can Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags
BUT BOC BASIC can only view, print and view flags

title: Designate for Release or Assignment Permissions - Club - Major Transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN on a Designate for Release or Assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN the Club Admin can view and print all MJ tx in all states
AND can view all Approved MJ tx including other clubs MJ tx or BOC only tx
BUT cannot see BOC Notes or Comment fields
AND no tx in a suppressed state

title: Edit an existing designated for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an existing Designate for Release or Assignment for a player
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN the form will reload in edit mode 
AND BOC is able to edit all fields in all states except for Approved and Reversed transactions
AND clubs only have access to attach new files in any state other than Preliminary or Rejected. 
AND clubs cannot edit existing attachments or any other part of transaction
AND on Approved and Reversed transactions, edit only gives BOC access to attach new files or edit existing attachments. 
AND they can also update "Comments" and "BOC Notes" fields
AND saving will save the tx and its current values and reload the form in view mode

title: Delete a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has edit permissions for a designate for release or assignment tx
AND the tx is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Delete"
custom_expected:
THEN a warning will display "Are you sure you want to delete this [form]? ("Form" to be replaced with transaction type)"
AND after clicking yes the form should be closed and no record should be kept. User should be returned to entry point of the transaction and a blue notification should be thrown

title: BOC user can approve a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND a Designate for release or assignment tx is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC or Rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN  the status will update to "Approved"
AND a successful blue notification will display
AND the item will be removed from the approvals clipboard
AND the player's Player History: Code = DFA, Description = Designated for Release or Assignment, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND set the player's MJ Roster Status to Designated for Assignment
AND set the player's MN Roster Status to null

title: BOC user can reject a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND a Designate for release or assignment tx is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC or Rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN the status will update to "Rejected"
AND a successful reject notification is displayed
AND the item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND reverse player's Pending org and club, Pending MJ Roster Status and Pending MN Roster Status
AND remove pending player history entry

title: BOC user can reverse a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND a tx is in a state of "Approved"
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Reverse"
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Reversed"
AND any action items that were generated as a result of this transaction being submitted or approved are removed
AND display reversed transaction in player history with “Voided:” in front of the transaction description
AND player's Club, MJ and MN Roster statuses and level of play will update to their values from prior to the transaction being approved

title: BOC user can reverse and suppress a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND a tx is in a state of "Approved"
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Reverse and Suppress"
custom_expected:
Then clicking "Reverse and Suppress" will first reverse, and then suppress the tx
AND any action items that were generated as a result of this transaction being submitted or approved are removed
AND display reversed transaction in player history with “Voided:” in front of the transaction description
AND player's Club, MJ and MN Roster statuses and level of play will update to their values from prior to the transaction being approved
AND when a tx is suppressed it will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches, and any other place where it is visible on UI.

title: BOC user can suppress a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND a tx is in a state of "Reversed"
custom_steps: When clicking "Suppress"
custom_expected: THEN the  tx is suppressed it will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches, and any other place where it is visible on UI.
